resources.string: Data on screen is automatically updated every 10 seconds. If you want to refresh the screen manually, swipe down from the top.
The link to change your password has been sent by email. Please check your inbox.
Verification email has been resent, please check your email.
Failed to send a verification email. Please retry in a minute.
No account matches your input. Please check your account and try again.
Account Settings have been changed. Please sign in again.
Baby information has been changed successfully.
Failed to change baby information. Please try again.
Failed to change device name. Please try again.
Failed to change password. Please try it again.
Nickname you entered is the same as before. Please make any change.
Failed to change nickname. Please try it again.
Failed to invite a new member.
Failed to remove a member. Please check the account ID.
Leaving the group has been succeeded.
Leaving the group has been failed. Please try again later.
Humidity range setting has been changed.
Failed to change humidity range setting. Please try again later.
Temperature range setting has been changed.
Failed to change temperature range setting. Please try again later.
LED indicator turning-on time setting has been changed.
Failed to change LED indicator turning-on time setting. Please try again later.
New update is available. If you click the Update button, setup file will be downloaded automatically. Then, please open the file and conduct the updating.
New version is available now. Please update your application.
Do you want to close the app?
Invalid login information, Please enter valid information.
Invalid account ID and password. Please enter correct information.
Connection error with the server. Please try again.(%1$s)
Please enter the membership code for invitation(6-digit)
Do you want to sign out?
If you sign out, you will be disconnected from your devices and cannot receive shared information. Are you sure to proceed?
Do you want to delete your account?

If you delete your account, current sharing groups are removed and cannot share your device status. Once the account is deleted, it is hard to initialize settings of the device connected. Please make sure to finish all the initializing process before leave. Sign-in again with the same email account will be possible after two weeks from deletion. Do you want to proceed?
Do you want to leave the group owned by %1$s(%2$s)?
Internet network is needed to connect to Diaper Sensor.
Searching for the device now.\nOne moment please.
Connecting the device now.\nOne moment please.
Setting the Internet connection on the hub.\nOne moment please.
Connection to the device failed.\nPlease check blue light is flashing, and try again later.
Setting the Internet connection failed.\nPlease check the information of the wireless network and try again.

Cannot find the diaper sensor nearby.
Please try again after following steps.
1. Turn the senson off and on.
2. The sensor LED blinks blue.
3. Select Try again button below.

Cannot find Hub nearby.
Please try again after following steps.
1. Remove the sensor from the hub and put it into the hub again.
2. The hub LED is kept in yellow for 3 seconds.
3. Select Try again button below.
Cannot find devices nearby.\nPlease check blue light is flashing and try again later.
Do you want to connect to the Hub additionally?
Without wireless network setting, you cannot receive real-time information when outside. If you\'d like to do wireless network setting later, go to Hub setting then.
Delete the connected device. If this device is deleted, other devices in the same group will be deleted as well. Are you sure to continue?

Initialize the device. After initialization is completed, the device will be disconnected and the data of the device will be removed from your phone. If you would like to connect devices, register again.
To find the device, blue LED light flashes for 5 seconds.
Alphabets, numbers and special characters are only available.
The email address is already registered.
This email address has already been deleted.
Unable to send verification email, please try again.
Input at least a special character
Please select one of the options above.
Such ID not found. Please enter correct ID.
Invalid serial number, Please try again

Verification e-mail was sent. Please check your 
%1$s

 and click Authenticate button
then move to next step.
Monit account is necessary for using Monit service.\nFill out boxes below and select the button on the top.
Please enter the information of the guardian who created the account and complete the registration.\nThe information you input will be used for product improvement through statistics and analysis.
Thank you for using MONIT. We will do our best to give happiness and comforts to babies and moms.
You already have a registered sensor. Would you like to register additional one?
Choose a device to be shown on the main screen. You cannot register an additional device before initialize the device already registered.
Ready for connection to the Diaper Sensor
Please input the information of baby who uses this sensor. The accuracy of the sensor may be related to this information.
Sensor is ready to use.\nCheck the below instruction images to use it.
Ready for connection to the Hub
Please connect the USB power to the hub using the supplied adapter.\nWhen connecting to a USB port on your computer or a multi USB ports, it may not work properly due to insufficient power supply.
Why should I connect to Hub?
Please connect a charging cable to Hub.
Check if the diaper sensor is connected to your smart phone.
Put the sensor into a hub. The sensor needs to be plugged into the hub to activate it. The hub will be connected with your smart phone through the sensor.
Only 2.4Ghz Wireless network is able to be connected.
Hub is Connected! Press search button below for Hub connection to Wireless network.
Choose a network below to use for the hub
Now Hub is ready to use.
Turn on Diaper Sensor and Hub then check blue LED flashing. Lastly, press CONNECT button upper right side.
Bluetooth is required for this mode.
You need to connect to the Diaper Sensor before the Hub connection.
No device is connected to your smart phone.\nPlease register a new device.
Lost connection with Hub. Please check the internet network status. If the problem persists, remove and re-plug the hub power adapter.
Please check the internet network status. To change the network, go to the upper right Setting and select Change Network.
Lost connection with a sensor. Please check the sensor is on, and place it near by your smart phone or Hub.
Please make sure the sensor is on, and place it nearby your smart phone or Hub.
Please turn on ac or open the window for cool air
Please turn on air purifier or open the window!
Fart detected! A little bit of poo may be as well. Please check the diaper!
High humidity and gas are detected.\nCheck and refresh the diaper.
After change diaper please press here.
Delete the device and leave the group
When temperature goes out of the optimal range you set, the alarm will notify you.
When humidity goes out of the optimal range you set, the alarm will notify you.
To not disturb sleep, the light will be turned on only between the time you set
Fart detected! A little bit of poo may be as well. Please check the diaper!
Please check and refresh the diaper.
The humidity exceeded the highest humidity level you set.
The humidity is below the lowest humidity level you set.
The temperature exceeded the highest temperature level you set.
The temperature is below the lowest temperature level you set.
VOC gas detected.\nPlease ventilate the room.
Low Battery power. Please recharge now.
No member shares the real-time device status with you. If you want to invite a member, select INVITE button on the top.
Swipe the member to the left if you want to remove from the group.
You can invite others into this group and share your device status with invitees.
If you want to leave the group, select the Leave button on the top.
You can be invited into a group and receive the device status of the group leader.
This group name is shown only on my application.
After inviting other users into this group, you can share the device status with members in real time.
If the member is deleted, the information of devices in this group would not be shared. Do you want to delete this member?
The update has been completed successfully.
Maximum value cannot be lower than the minimum value.
Sharing setting has been changed.\nRenew the data.
Connection with the Hub has failed. If it fails several times, please remove the sensor from the hub and try again from the beginning.
The sensor has been removed from the hub.\n Please put it into the hub.
As this is a shared device, you can set the alarm and temperature unit only.
As this is a shared device, you can set the alarm only.
Enter the account ID at least 3 characters.
Enter the account ID at least 3 characters.
This hub is only able to connect with 2.4Ghz wireless networks. 5Ghz networks are unable to be found and connected.
If you forcibly shut down this app, the Bluetooth connection between your smart phone and the sensor will be lost. In case of disconnection, you may not receive the notification alert.
Do not watch from next time
This device has been already registered. You are able to get the information of this device with joining the group. Do you want to continue this connection?
Connection with the device failed with bad bluetooth communication. Please try this again after rebooting this sensor.
Connection with the device failed with bad Internet communication. Please try this again after checking the Internet status.
Update available. Please update the firmware.
Do not power off the device or close this application. The device might operate abnormally.
Firmware update completed. The diaper sensor will now reboot. It will connect with your smartphone shortly.
Battery power of the diaper sensor is too low. Please try this again after charging it.
Firmware update failed. Please restart the diaper sensor with switch off and on.
Do you want to halt the firmware updating?
If you want to invite a member, select + button.\nIf you want to delete a member, select the member.
What is Membership code?\nThis code is issued by Monit with 6-digits. This ONLY includes letters and numbers.\nYou can check this code by going to: Account > Membership code
The membership code which can be used for sharing information feature has been issued. You can see this code from Account > Membership code menu.
This feature needs connection between the sensor and this smart phone.
If you exit this screen, the device might not work. Would you like to exit this screen?
Failed to get found wireless network information. Please try it again after removing the sensor from the hub and putting it into the hub.

Monit Application needs below permissions granted.

1. Location
- This permission is needed for connection with Monit devices through BLE.
2. Disabled optimization of battery usage.
- Battery usage optimization might ignore the alarm messages from Monit devices and lead to sharing feature malfunction.

Please allow the permissions for the better usage of Monit Service.

Sensor connection failed. Please enable airplane mode of this smartphone for resetting Bluetooth network. And close this application. If this problem occurs continuously, please reboot this smartphone.
This feature needs to reset BLE connection. Check following steps.
Put the diaper sensor to the hub.
Place this smartphone with bluetooth enabled near the sensor.
Within 30 seconds, the diaper sensor will connect with this smartphone automatically and the screen will be changed.
Monit Application needs below permissions granted. Please allow the permissions for the better usage of Monit Service.
This permission is needed to connect the app with Monit devices via Bluetooth.
Battery usage optimization might ignore the alarm messages from Monit devices and lead to sharing feature malfunction.
Collection and Use of Personal Information
New update is available. Please update your MONIT application.\nSelect below download link if you have a trouble for connecting Google PlayStore.
Download completed. Please pull down the notification bar and select download completed notification. You can install new update now.
An error has been occurred during update the application. Please restart the application.

During the OTA update, the Hub LED will repeat in red, green and blue.\nThe Hub LED will change to red, green or blue once the update is complete.\nWhen the update is complete, press the button below.
To use the Monit service, you need to agree to the terms and conditions by selecting checkbox. You can see the terms and conditions by selecting show button.\n(*) is a required agreement.
I agree to all the terms.
모닛 서비스 이용중에 사용하실 닉네임을 입력해주세요.(1~12자)
약관동의 여부를 확인하는데 오류가 발생했습니다. 인터넷 연결을 확인해주세요.
Your account has been unsubscribed. To recover your account, please send an email to support@goodmonit.com Customer Support.
Found invalid certificate. Do you want to continue?
보안인증서 문제로 회원가입 페이지가 뜨지 않는 경우에는 크롬앱을 이용하시거나 PC로 MOMQ 사이트에 접속하셔서 회원가입 해주세요.
The update has been stopped due to low battery. Charge the battery to at least 30% to continue the update.
The sensor charging has been stopped because of an error. Disconnect the charger and sensor, then turn the sensor off and on again.
Please turn on ac or open the window for cool air
Please turn on air purifier or open the window!
Please turn on ac or open the window for cool air
Please turn on air purifier or open the window!
Please turn on ac or open the window for cool air
Please turn on air purifier or open the window!
Please turn on ac or open the window for cool air
Please turn on air purifier or open the window!

To use the Monit service, you need to agree to the terms and conditions by selecting checkbox. You can see the terms and conditions by selecting show button.\nEU (European Union) Citizens are applicable to General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).\n(*) is a required agreement.

Detection test mode is enabled for 1 minute to check whether this sensor operates normally. Blow the sensor hole for 5 seconds. You can receive a detection alarm. After 1 minute or click the cancel button, this window closes and the detection test mode is disabled.
Now Hub is ready to use.\nWhen temperature or humidity goes out of the optimal range you set below, the alarm will notify you. You can set these options in the setting page of this hub as well.

This device has already registered. Please give your 6-digit membership code to the user who has registered this device. If you are invited to the user\'s sharing group, you can connect this device automatically without registration.\nMembership code:
Sensor firmware updates provide enhanced functionality.
Hub firmware updates provide enhanced functionality.
Please choose the type of feeding.
The sensor is connected with this smartphone through Bluetooth.
The latest firmware update is available.\nDo you want to update the firmware?
Gas detected, whether it is poo or not being analyzed.\nIt may take up to 5 minutes for analysis and, if the sensor is taken off beforehand, you may not receive the poo alarm.
The diaper status has been initialized.
아래의 인증키를 발급하여 로그인하면 연동 성공!
Lost connection with the sensor. Please place the sensor near by your smart phone or Hub.
Now, turn the nursing light on and off remotely from this application!
Select below buttons to adjust the brightness of the nursing light.
You can set the auto-off timer.
Ready for connection to the Nursing lamp

Cannot find nursing lamp nearby.
Please try again after following steps.
1. Reconnect the USB power to the nursing lamp.
2. Check the nursing lamp LED is kept blinking in blue.
3. Select Try again button below.

Please connect the USB power to the nursing lamp using the supplied adapter.\nWhen connecting to a USB port on your computer or a multi USB ports, it may not work properly due to insufficient power supply.
Choose a network below to use for the nursing lamp
This nursing lamp is enable to connect with only 2.4Ghz band wireless network. 5Ghz band wireless network is unavailable to be found and connected.
Nursing lamp is Connected! Press search button below for nursing lamp connection to Wireless network.
Now nursing lamp is ready to use.

Now nursing lamp is ready to use.\nWhen temperature or humidity goes out of the optimal range you set below, the alarm will notify you. You can set these options in the setting page of this nursing lamp as well.
Setting the Internet connection on the nursing lamp.\nOne moment please.
Failed to get found wireless network information. Please try it again.
Lost connection with the nursing lamp. Please check the internet network status. If the problem persists, remove and re-plug the nursing lamp power adapter.
Lost connection with the nursing lamp
Please check the internet network status. To change the network, go to the upper right Setting and select Change Network.
Nursing lamp firmware updates provide enhanced functionality.
You can see the current diaper status.
You can see a graph which shows the number of alerts during a week or a month.
You can see received alert list.
You can set baby information or notification alarm.
To use the Huggies x Monit service, you need to agree to the terms and conditions by selecting checkbox. You can see the terms and conditions by selecting show button.\n(*) is a required agreement.
Huggies x Monit account is necessary for using this service.\nFill out boxes below and select the button on the top.
Welcome to Huggies x Monit Service
Huggies x Monit will help babycare smarter.
HuggiesxMonit needs your permission below to better use the app.
This permission is needed to connect the app with the Huggies x Monit sensor via Bluetooth.
Battery usage optimization might ignore the alarm messages from Huggies x Monit devices and lead to sharing feature malfunction.
Ready for connection to the package
Put the sensor into a hub. The sensor needs to be plugged into the hub to activate it. The hub will be connected with your smart phone through the sensor.
Information of baby who uses this sensor
Information of room for the hub

This diaper sensor has already been registered. Please give your 6-digit membership code to the user who has registered this device. If you are invited to the user\'s sharing group, you can connect this device automatically without registration.\nMembership code:

This diaper sensor has already been registered.
To register the diaper sensor properly, the diaper sensor needs to be reset.
Would you like to reset the diaper sensor?
(Please note that all your previous records will be deleted when you reset the diaper sensor.)
The diaper sensor has been reset successfully.\nRedirecting to the previous page.

This hub has already been registered. Please give your 6-digit membership code to the user who has registered this device. If you are invited to the user\'s sharing group, you can connect this device automatically without registration.\nMembership code:

Input the serial number of the diaper sensor which is placed on the backside of the sensor or a package box. After checking the serial number, the sensor will be initialized.
Serial number is like "MKX123123123"
[Warning]
This initializing will delete all the data from this sensor.
Diaper sensor initializing has been succeeded
Diaper sensor initializing has been failed.

Input the serial number of the hub which is placed on the bottom of the hub or a package box. After checking the serial number, the hub will be initialized.
Serial number is like "HKX123123123"
[Warning]
This initializing will delete all the data from this hub.
Initializing the device now.\nOne moment please.
Input at least a lowercase letter.
Input at least an uppercase letter.
How to attach the diaper cradle
Please attach the diaper cradle so that the sensing part is visible in the hole.
How to attach to the diaper
Attach the sensor to the bottom of the hips.\nThe sensor position may affect alarm accuracy.\nTwist the sensor lightly so that it is firmly attached to the diaper.
To ensure the best security, please update the firmware to the most recent version available.
To ensure the best security, please update the sensor firmware to the most recent version available.
To ensure the best security, please update the hub firmware to the most recent version available.
To ensure the best security, please update the firmware to the most recent version available.
Your password must be a combination of 8 to 64 single-byte upper letters, lower letters, numbers and special characters.
Diaper sensor has been fully charged.\nNow you can check diaper status with the sensor.
Diaper sensor is on standby now.\nIt will start sensing within 30 seconds from attachment to a diaper.
Sensor is monitoring the status of baby.
Elapsed time from the latest diaper changed(%1$s)
Little amount of Humidity and Gas are detected in the diaper.
High humidity and gas are detected.\nCheck and refresh the diaper.
Input sleep start and end time.
Please select time and diaper status
Please input feeding type, time and amount.
Depending on the network environment, you may experience a delay of 3 to 5 seconds.
Baby monitoring has been paused. Please attach this sensor again.
Please come near by me. Sensor has been disconnected.

If the sleep mode is enabled, the diaper sensor monitors the quality of the sleep.\nAlso if the baby awakes or moves, it sends movement detected notification to the smartphone.\nA user can check the history of the sleep at the graph tab.

The diaper sensor analyzes pee, poop and gas in a diaper and the diaper wearing time to show the soiled stage of the diaper. There are 3 stages of Good, Soiled, Check.
Good: The diaper is clean.
Soiled: The diaper has been soiled a little bit.
Check: The diaper has been soiled a lot so that a user needs to check the diaper.

VOCs are numerous, varied, and ubiquitous. They include both human-made and naturally occurring chemical compounds. Most scents or odors are of VOCs.
This value shows the amount of the average of the VOCs in a diaper during 5 minutes. And there are 5 stages of None, Low, High, Very High and Very Bad.
If the stage of High is maintained continuously, please check the diaper.
Even if there is poop or fart in the diaper, the amount of VOCs could be detected little bit differently like the odors of poop or fart is different.

This value is the level of movements which a diaper sensor detects.\nIf a baby moves continuously or a baby moves quickly, this value changes to the higher.\nThere are 4 stages of None, Calm, Active and Energetic.

The sensor status can be displayed by Ready, Stand by and Analyzing.
Ready: The diaper sensor is monitoring.
Stand by: The diaper sensor needs to be attached to a diaper. If a user attaches it, the status would be changed to Ready within 30 seconds.
Analyzing: The diaper sensor detects increase of the amount of the gas in a diaper and it analyzes the components of the gas.
Google Assistant 앱을 실행합니다. \nAssistant 앱이 실행되면 \"베이비 모니터에게 말하기\" 라고 말해주세요. 자동으로 인증페이지에 연결됩니다.
아래의 인증키를 발급하여 로그인하면 연동 성공!
Please enable Location to connect the device via Bluetooth(BLE).
Please check a socket to charge a diaper sensor when you connect a hub. No socket is in a lamp.
Update about the information of baby using this sensor. The accuracy of the sensor may be related to this information.
You can get a notification when 15 minutes elapsed since this sensor was disconnected.
You can get an alarm when a diaper soiled a lot.
You can get an alarm when a diaper is soiled by pee, poo and so on.
You can get an alarm when your baby is awake or tossing.
This shows the version of firmware and you can update this device to the latest version of the firmware.
You can get an alarm when temperature is out of range from this range you have set.
You can get an alarm when humidity is out of range from this range you have set.
Turning on/off the LED(blue or red) which is on the top case of this device.
This shows the name of the access point which has been set now. You can connect/update an access point to connect to the Internet.

To update the firmware of this lamp, this lamp should be connected to the Internet.\nBut now, the lamp is only connected to the smartphone via Bluetooth without any Internet connection.\nIf you want to update the firmware, please connect this lamp to the Internet with selecting network change button at the device setting page.
Please input the information of patient who uses this sensor. The accuracy of the sensor may be related to this information.

This lamp is not connected to the Internet. This feature is disabled when this lamp is only connected with this smartphone via Bluetooth. Please connect this lamp to the Internet via Setting > Network.

[Warning]
This initializing will delete all the data from this sensor.
If you want to reset, please enter the membership code below.
Membership code
